fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Fusaka DevNet 3 at 99% participation, Sepolia BPO1 completed (15 max blobs), Holesky fork in 5 days
Mainnet Fusaka: Dec 3rd, BPO1 Dec 9th (moved from Dec 17th), BPO2 Jan 7th - client releases Nov 3rd

critical_infrastructure.highlight: Holesky shutting down Oct 31st - already at 70% participation, urgent migration to Sepolia/Hoodi needed

testing_progress.highlight: BAL DevNet Zero launching tomorrow/early next week

glamsterdam_governance.highlight: Non-headliner EIP deadline: Oct 30th (PR to repo sufficient)
30 EIPs proposed (3 CL, 27 EL) - client opinion documents due Nov 6th, finalize scope by end of November

repricing_discussion.highlight: Compute opcodes 20% underpriced due to integer rounding at current 30-50 Mgas/sec anchor
Two solutions proposed: 1000x gas rebase vs milli-gas with internal counters and transaction-level rounding
Glamsterdam's 8-second execution window will significantly impact gas pricing calculations

eip_updates.highlight: Removed EIP-7667 (ZK precompile repricing) and EIP-6873 (MODEXP) from PFI list
EIP-8058 presented: skip gas costs for duplicate bytecode via access lists (97% of deployments are duplicates)

organizational.highlight: Two repricing breakout calls scheduled: Wednesdays at 3 UTC (Oct 30 & Nov 6)

action_items.action: Prepare opinion documents on proposed EIPs
Be available to answer questions about proposed EIPs over next two weeks
Remove EIP-7667 and EIP-6873 from PFI list
Create write-up on code chunking compatibility with EIP-8058
Propose both gas precision solutions (rebase and milli-gas) as separate EIPs
Decide internally whether to keep ACDE call during DevCon week

decisions.decision: Pre-committed to Fusaka timeline (Dec 3/9/Jan 7) conditional on Holesky success
Non-headliner EIP proposals due Oct 30th (PR to EIP repo sufficient)
Client opinion documents due Nov 6th, finalize Glamsterdam scope by end of November
Removed EIP-7667 and EIP-6873 from Glamsterdam PFI list

targets.target: Fusaka mainnet: December 3, 2025 | BPO1: December 9 | BPO2: January 7, 2026
Repricing breakout calls: October 30 & November 6, 2025 at 3 UTC
